item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Maire Tecnimont Logo
Maire Tecnimont S.p.A. is an Italian group numbering 50 operating companies in the engineering, technology and energy sectors. It deals in plant engineering in oil and gas, chemicals and petrochemicals, in green chemistry and in technology supporting energy transition. Maire Tecnimont manages large turnkey licensing, engineering, procurement and construction projects in different geographical areas. It operates in over 45 countries in four continents through a staff of around 6,300 employees.
You can download theMaire Tecnimontlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Maire Tecnimont
item.description: Maire Tecnimont S.p.A. is an Italian group numbering 50 operating companies in the engineering, technology and energy sectors. It deals in plant engineering in oil and gas, chemicals and petrochemicals, in green chemistry and in technology supporting energy transition. Maire Tecnimont manages large turnkey licensing, engineering, procurement and construction projects in different geographical areas. It operates in over 45 countries in four continents through a staff of around 6,300 employees.
